annotations.text:
TVS Segment # (TREAT_SEG)
Please indicate the segment number from the Target Venous Segment form (TVS______). Please add the segment on the TVS form before proceeding with this form.
Was the IVUS performed prior to the procedure? (PRE_IVUS)
annotations.annotation: RSCAT = CLOT RETRIEVER when RSTESTCD = IVS | [NOT SUBMITTED]
annotations.question_annotation: RSCAT = CLOT RETRIEVER when RSTESTCD = IVS

option_annotations.No: RSCAT = NOT DONE when RSTESTCD = IVS

annotations.annotation: More than more than one selected: RELOC = NL, NL, NL (Specific segments in SUPP values using the CHAM values SEGCH, SECH, SEGIL, SEGEL, SEGOF, SEGBF, SEGBF, SEGCAF, SEGBRO
